item.title: Redoing Thread

item.description:
@F_A_I_L_S wrote:

Taharahora:

I want it released with just combat working and exp rates very low

Taharahora:

Once I work on adding stuff to a skill or redoing it completely it will be released.

Confusion strikes again. Anyway, I don’t want your thread full of spam, so I wish you the best of luck.

Read full topic

item.title: Redoing Thread
item.dc:creator: @Taharahora Taharahora
item.description:
@Taharahora wrote:

Fails:

Thanks for the clarification. However, i’m still a bit confused. Why are you disabling the skills? Unless this is going to be a PK-Server, if that’s the case, I see why.

Cause the skills are crap to start with. I am kinda making my own version of runescape. I want it released with just combat working and exp rates very low. Once I work on adding stuff to a skill or redoing it completely it will be released. I am not going to have half-assed PI skills or even 716, there skills aren’t the best either. It is pretty much going to be in development phases for a month, and I don’t want to have to do a reset or anything. so releasing it piece by piece once the piece is done is a better way to do it.

Read full topic

item.title: Redoing Thread
item.dc:creator: @F_A_I_L_S Fails
item.description:
@F_A_I_L_S wrote:

[quote=“Taharahora, post:4, topic:460715”]this thread isn’t even close to being done, been updating it for like 2 hours. The base is basic PI but debating on moving up to 716s

Disabling all the drops, npcs, skills and etc because I am rewriting all of them. When this server starts it will be combat and up to addy armor only. no skills will be added. within a week or two everything will be fully working.[/quote]
Thanks for the clarification. However, i’m still a bit confused. Why are you disabling the skills? Unless this is going to be a PK-Server, if that’s the case, I see why.

Read full topic

item.title: Redoing Thread
item.dc:creator: @Taharahora Taharahora
item.description:
@Taharahora wrote:

[quote=“Fails, post:3, topic:460715”]You may want to check this out. It was created to help members make their development team thread more ‘attractive’.

Moving on. You need to give more information about the server. What you’re using as a base, what you wish to achieve whilst working on this project, etc. Other than that, good luck to you and your team.

Oh, I was also wandering about this:

[quote]Disable all skills, Take all shops out
Disable all drops[/quote]
I was just curious as to why you wish to disable all skills, shops, etc.[/quote]

this thread isn’t even close to being done, been updating it for like 2 hours. The base is basic PI but debating on moving up to 716s

Disabling all the drops, npcs, skills and etc because I am rewriting all of them. When this server starts it will be combat and up to addy armor only. no skills will be added. within a week or two everything will be fully working.

Read full topic

item.title: Redoing Thread

You may want to check this out. It was created to help members make their development team thread more ‘attractive’.

Moving on. You need to give more information about the server. What you’re using as a base, what you wish to achieve whilst working on this project, etc. Other than that, good luck to you and your team.

Oh, I was also wandering about this:

Disable all skills, Take all shops out Disable all drops
I was just curious as to why you wish to disable all skills, shops, etc.
